item.title: Vários - Stay With Me - Key of Am
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Stay With Me - Sam Smith
Using the chords: Am C F
This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Vários - Best Day Of My Life - Key of F
item.description: This is a "reboot" of an old video. Chords: C, F, Am Strum: D DU -U DU

item.title: Vários - Best Day Of My Life - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Best Day Of My Life by American Authors on the ukulele. The chords used are C F Am. (Original in D https://youtu.be/6N_IvD31URc)
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Vários - Best Day Of My Life - Key of D
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Best Day Of My Life by American Authors on the ukulele. The chords used are D G Bm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Vários - All Of Me - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
As performed by John Legend
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Vários - All Of Me - Key of G
item.description: Em, C, G, D, Am - Strum guide audio at the beginning of the video. The pattern is a suggestion, but I encourage you to listen to the rhythm that is in the audio and vary the rhythm to match what's in the audio!
